Title: Cypriot government determined to bring Vasilikos LNG terminal online
Description: According to a statement today by the President of Cyprus Nikos Christodoulidis, the Vasilikos LNG terminal will be implemented even with the contractor’s exit from the project.
Author: JS

Title: Woodside to acquire US project developer Tellurian and its Driftwood LNG project
Description: Australian independent Woodside Energy has entered into a definitive agreement with US project developer Tellurian to purchase all its shares and those of its proposed 27.6 mtpa Driftwood LNG project in the US in an all-cash transaction. The deal is expected to advance the Driftwood LNG project in Lake Charles, Louisiana, towards a final investment decision and expand Woodside’s global LNG footprint.
Author: CK

Title: Freeport LNG restarts exports after two-week shutdown due to hurricane-induced damages
Description: The 15 mtpa Freeport LNG plant on Quintana Island has shipped its first cargo since shutting down on July 7 in preparation for Hurricane Beryl’s landfall, indicating a restart of LNG production at the plant.
Author: CK
